metadata.title: CVE-2023-51780 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. do_vcc_ioctl innet/atm/ioctl.c has a use-after-free because of a vcc_recvmsg racecondition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
